comment.author: 36772982@N00
comment._content: It was erected on May 11, 330 by Constantine the Great to celebrate the designation of Constantinople as the new capital of the Roman Empire. www.turkeytravelplanner.com/go/Istanbul/Sights/Beyazit/ce...

comment.author: 8303095@N03
comment._content: It's very close to grand bazaar. Undergoing restoration right now. So the column is all wrapped up with walkways and scaffolds.
